SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.mattharrah.gedcom4j.writer
Class GedcomWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.mattharrah.gedcom4j.writer.GedcomWriter

public class GedcomWriter
extends java.lang.Object

A class for writing the gedcom structure out as a GEDCOM 5.5 compliant file.

Author:
frizbog1

Field Summary
private  Gedcom gedcom
          The Gedcom data to write
private  java.io.PrintWriter pw
          The PrintWriter we are writing to
(package private)  boolean validationSuppressed
          Are we suppressing the call to the validator? Deliberately package-private so unit tests can fiddle with it to make testing easy.

Constructor

Method Detail

write

public void write(java.io.File file)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  GedcomValidationException,
                  GedcomWriterException
Write the Gedcom data as a GEDCOM 5.5 file. Automatically fills in the value for the FILE tag in the HEAD structure.

Parameters:
file - the File to write to
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there's a problem writing the data
GedcomValidationException - if the gedcom data has validation errors that won't allow it to be written
GedcomWriterException - if the data is malformed and cannot be written

write

public void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
           throws GedcomValidationException,
                  GedcomWriterException
Write the Gedcom data in GEDCOM 5.5 format to an output stream

Parameters:
out - the output stream we're writing to
Throws:
GedcomValidationException - if the gedcom data has validation errors that won't allow it to be written
GedcomWriterException - if the data is malformed and cannot be written

write

public void write(java.lang.String filename)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  GedcomValidationException,
                  GedcomWriterException
Write the Gedcom data as a GEDCOM 5.5 file, with the supplied file name

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to write
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there's a problem writing the data
GedcomValidationException - if the gedcom data has validation errors that won't allow it to be written
GedcomWriterException - if the data is malformed and cannot be written

emitAssociationStructures

private void emitAssociationStructures(int level,
                                       java.util.List<Association> associations)
                                throws GedcomWriterException
Emit the person-to-person associations an individual was in - see ASSOCIATION_STRUCTURE in the GEDCOM spec.

Parameters:
level - the level at which to start recording
associations - the list of associations
Throws:
GedcomWriterException - if the data is malformed and cannot be written

emitLinesOfText

private void emitLinesOfText(int level,
                             java.lang.String startingTag,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> linesOfText)
Emit a multi-line text value.

Parameters:
level - the level we are starting at. Continuation lines will be one level deeper than this value
startingTag - the tag to use for the first line of the text. All subsequent lines will be "CONT" lines.
linesOfText - the lines of text

                                   java.lang.String tag,

Write a line if the value is non-null

Parameters:
level - the level within the file hierarchy

emitTagWithOptionalValue

private void emitTagWithOptionalValue(int level,
                                      java.lang.String tag,
                                      java.lang.String value)
                               throws GedcomWriterException
Write a line and tag, with an optional value for the tag

Parameters:
level - the level within the file hierarchy
tag - the tag for the line of the file
value - the value to write to the right of the tag
Throws:
GedcomWriterException - if the value is null or blank (which never happens, because we check for it)

private void emitTagWithRequiredValue(int level,
                                      java.lang.String tag,
                                      java.lang.String value)
                               throws GedcomWriterException

                                      java.lang.String xref,
                                      java.lang.String tag,
                                      java.lang.String value)
                               throws GedcomWriterException
Write a line and tag, with an optional value for the tag

Parameters:
level - the level within the file hierarchy
tag - the tag for the line of the file
value - the value to write to the right of the tag
xref - the xref of the item being emitted

GedcomWriterException - if the value is null or blank
